pr_title: Accessibility: Add alt tags where they are missing

timeline.message: Add alt tag to the logo
If the alt tag is empty, use the source instead in the ImageRenderer

timeline.body: No need for new // $NON-NLS-1$ comments.  In fact, can you please bulk delete them when you see them?  :)

timeline.body: Just an FYI, the original intention of ImageRenderer was that alt was never optional.  (See the comment on the constructor :) )  This change seems fine however.

timeline.author: abidingotter

timeline.body:
I'm thinking there's nothing (at least in the doco for the Label interface) that says `getText()` will return a non-null value. That combined with convention elsewhere in the code base could I suggest using `StringUtils`:

```suggestion
    if (alt != null && StringUtils.isNotBlank(alt.getText())) {
```
timeline.bodyHTML:

Suggested change

if (alt != null && StringUtils.isNotBlank(alt.getText())) {
